channel.title: Nexus-World - The Undead Revolution
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/b4w8jr.jpg[/img](made by me)
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Goals[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donation]A Bit More Information[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#applying]The Staff Application Layout[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credit] The Events[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Coming soon, PM me if you want more detail.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] Nexus-World is just a fun server to play, not those "Dedicated for #1! We Are the best" For a fact, we know we aren't the best but this is still a fun game to play.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=aim]3.0 - Goals[/b][/size] This server is aiming to be an average eco/pk server. We hope we will reach that average goal.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=donation]4.0 - A bit more information[/b][/size] The server's donation will be used 100% on improving the server/forums.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=appliying]5.0 - The Staff Application Layout[/b][/size]
Here is the layout:
[code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ [/code] [ul][center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
Coders:
[b]0/7[/b]
Nexus (ME) OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN
Suggestors:
[b]0/2[/b]
OPEN OPEN
Testers:
[b]0/8[/b]
OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=credit]7.0 - The Events[/b][/size]
[b]Event - Christmas[/b] 20-25th December 2012 [b]Event - Easter[/b] 1-10th April 2013 [b]Event - Summer Event[/b] July-August 2013
TBH, i'm not sure we'll last until july but lets try :D[/ul]

item.title: Nexus-World - The Undead Revolution
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/b4w8jr.jpg[/img](made by me)

[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#aim]Goals[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#donation]A Bit More Information[/iurl][/li]

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/size]
Coming soon, PM me if you want more detail.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/size]
Nexus-World is just a fun server to play, not those “Dedicated for #1! We Are the best” For a fact, we know we aren’t the best but this is still a fun game to play.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=aim]3.0 - Goals[/size]
This server is aiming to be an average eco/pk server. We hope we will reach that average goal.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=donation]4.0 - A bit more information[/size]
The server’s donation will be used 100% on improving the server/forums.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=appliying]5.0 - The Staff Application Layout[/size]

Here is the layout:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?:
How old are you?:
E-mail address?:
What position do you want? (Coder, Suggester, Tester):
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?:
What time zone are you in?:
How long will you be on everyday?:
Why do you want to become part of this server?:
Any Suggestions?:
//*****Other Info Below Here*****\\

[ul][center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/size]

Coders:

0/7

Nexus (ME)
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN

Suggestors:

0/2

OPEN
OPEN

Testers:

0/8

OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
OPEN
[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=credit]7.0 - The Events[/size]

Event - Christmas 20-25th December 2012
Event - Easter 1-10th April 2013
Event - Summer Event July-August 2013

TBH, i’m not sure we’ll last until july but lets try :D[/ul]
